summary: Completed comprehensive code review using code-reviewer MCP approach and fixed all critical bugs found: 1) Fixed pagination bug in 7 API controllers (offset to page calculation), 2) Fixed race conditions in revenue recording by wrapping in transactions with lockForUpdate, 3) Fixed consultation credit race condition by wrapping entire method in DB transaction, 4) Improved cache invalidation to support all cache drivers (Redis, File, Database, Array). All fixes tested and verified. Created CODE_REVIEW_BUGS_FOUND.md with complete bug report.
current_status: All critical and high-priority bugs fixed. Pagination: ✅ Fixed in 7 controllers (offset correctly converted to page number). Race Conditions: ✅ Fixed with transaction wrapping and lockForUpdate. Cache Invalidation: ✅ Improved to support all cache drivers. Code quality: No linter errors, all fixes tested. Module is production ready with improved reliability and data integrity.
